rules_text:
As Kaneh Fortress enters, you may pay 1 life. If you don't, Kaneh Fortress enters tapped.
Satrapies you control have “{T}: Add {B}.”
flavor_text:
[i]“Sure, call it callous if you want. I prefer ‘efficient'; I am Will, after all, and only a single will in a prosperous society comes out on top.”
—Zhubin the Unbowed[/i]
